price: None has the right to be worshiped except Him, Who gives life and causes death – your Lord, and the Lord of your forefathers.
arabic: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ رَبُّكُمۡ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
